name: insomnia-plugin-workspace-jwt
description: This is a plugin for [insomnia](https://insomnia.rest) which provides workspace-wide JWT authentication. Tokens are automatically renewed when they expire. Simply define a request in the workspace as an authorization endpoint and reference the token in the response via JSONPath or XPath.
author: paddek
